introHeaderOne: NeedleTails specializes in making your application ideas a reality.
introHeaderTwo: With Enterprise Application experience, we have what it takes to handle complicated task and projects from start to finish. As we specialize in Swift software development, you will feel confident in the safety that the language brings to the table. We strive for quality products.
projectsDescription: We are dedicated to providing you with a wide range of open-source software. To support this mission, we also offer some closed-source software. We invite you to explore our projects, which include both open-source and closed-source options. If you're interested in contributing or obtaining a license for our closed-source software, please don't hesitate to get in touch with us.
projectsOverview: Here is a list of what we do and what we've done
businessOverviewDescription: Swift is a type-safe programming language, which means it helps prevent errors by ensuring that values are used correctly. It has a low memory footprint, allowing applications to run efficiently, especially on mobile devices. Additionally, Swift offers strong support for thread safety, ensuring that applications can handle multiple tasks at once without issues. By choosing NeedleTails, you can be confident that your projects will benefit from the reliability and performance that Swift provides, leading to high-quality software solutions tailored to your needs. Swift's advanatage is interoperability, which means we can incrementally move less efficient projects in different languages into swift and or call Swift APIs from your native languag.
businessOverviewDetails: We develop scalable, server-side solutions that provide your business with a solid and secure foundation, ensuring smooth operations and optimal performance.
businessOverviewPlanning: We believe that meticulous planning is essential for success. Our comprehensive blueprints, insightful inquiries, and guidance will support you throughout your journey.
serviceDescriptionTraining: We can enhance your team’s efficiency and skill set across various areas, including management, development, design, and testing.
serviceDescriptionBackendDevelopment: We specialize in server-side Swift, frameworks, and open-source solutions, ensuring robust and scalable backend development.
serviceDescriptionMobileAppDevelopment: We create visually appealing and user-friendly mobile applications for both Apple platforms and Android, ensuring optimal performance and user satisfaction.
serviceDescriptionWebDevelopment: We offer comprehensive web development using Vue.js with TypeScript, as well as Vapor or Toucan with Swift, depending on your needs, ensuring that your online presence accurately represents your business.
openSourceDescription: Wherever possible, we support the open source community. Let's connect with your audience across all devices through our native applications and backend services, powered by our exceptional open-source frameworks and libraries.
supportOpenSourceMessage: Support the GitHub NeedleTails project to give your projects the edge.
companyOverview: We are dedicated software development professionals committed to transforming your ideas into reality. Our expertise spans the creation of comprehensive products, including backend systems and native applications for Apple devices, Android, and the web, ensuring your business concept reaches its fullest potential.
backendSolutionsDescription: We excel in designing dependable and scalable server-side solutions using Swift, equipping businesses with effective backend infrastructures. This serves as a solid bedrock for your projects.
backendCapabilitiesOverview: Our backend capabilities focus on server-side Swift, utilizing the strength and adaptability of the Swift programming language. We craft secure, high-performance backend solutions customized to your specifications. Whether you require intricate API integrations, real-time data handling, or optimized server architectures, our team harnesses Swift’s remarkable features to propel your business forward.
backendKeyArea1: Software Architecture: Implementation of best practices and industry-standard design patterns.
backendKeyArea2: Code Quality Assurance: In-depth code analysis, reviews, and management of technical debt.
backendKeyArea3: Continuous Integration: Development of streamlined automated CI and delivery workflows.
backendKeyArea4: Quality Assurance: Comprehensive testing strategies, including both automated and manual methods, along with code coverage and performance benchmarks.
backendKeyArea5: Project Management: Clear definitions, requirements gathering, and management of expectations and risks.
backendKeyArea6: Product Management: Defining MVPs, articulating value propositions, and strategizing product technology.
nativeAppDevelopmentDescription: We elevate your projects into sophisticated native experiences, meticulously crafted for that native look and feel.
nativeAppDevelopmentOverview: Our team specializes in developing applications for the entire spectrum of Apple platforms and Android devices. With extensive knowledge of both UIKit and SwiftUI, we create seamless, intuitive, and high-performance applications for iOS, iPadOS, macOS, tvOS, watchOS, and visionOS. For Android, we leverage the Jetpack Compose UI framework to ensure a native aesthetic. Our expertise allows us to design and build applications that are not only visually striking and user-friendly but also deliver exceptional performance. Whether you need a polished mobile app, a powerful desktop application, or an engaging TV interface, we provide solutions that guarantee an outstanding user experience across all devices.
nativeAppKeyArea1: Planning: Ideation, feature validation, and detailed product specifications.
nativeAppKeyArea2: Analysis: Conducting business analysis, market research, and benchmarking.
nativeAppKeyArea3: Prototyping: Development of wireframes, prototypes, mockups, and conceptual designs.
nativeAppKeyArea4: User Experience Research: Validating user experience flows through end-user testing and research.
nativeAppKeyArea5: User Interface Design: Crafting custom user interfaces, design systems, and graphics.
nativeAppKeyArea6: Application Development: Creating native applications for Android and Apple platforms.
webDevelopmentExpertiseDescription: We apply our extensive knowledge to establish and maintain your business’s online presence.
webDevelopmentOverview: In the realm of web development, we offer a comprehensive suite of services tailored to diverse needs, from content management systems (CMS) to advanced web applications. Our technology stack includes Vue.js utilizing TypeScript and many other Swift Solutions including Vapor, Hummingbird 2, and Toucan. With these technologies we build dynamic, responsive, and user-friendly web interfaces. Whether you require a powerful admin dashboard, a flexible CMS, or a cutting-edge user interface, our team delivers web solutions that are both visually appealing and functionally robust.
webDevelopmentKeyArea1: Static Websites: Toucan is a new and great tool that we can leverage. Otherwise, we can use something like Vue.js to accomplish your project's needs.
webDevelopmentKeyArea2: CMS Development: Custom admin interfaces for flexible content management.
webDevelopmentKeyArea3: Dynamic Websites: Something that is a bit more robust, requiring application level response and support. We can leverage Server-Side Swift and front end frameworks to build your web application in mind.
webDevelopmentKeyArea4: SEO Services: Enhancing site visibility and improving rankings in search engine results.
webDevelopmentKeyArea5: Scalability: With Docker and Kuberneties, we can make sure your services are reachable to a global audience.
webDevelopmentKeyArea6: Architectural Solutions: We have access to Solutions Architects that will bridge the needs platforms and services at a reasonable cost.
consultingOverview: We provide a broad spectrum of consulting services, focusing on product management, project oversight, and training initiatives to ensure your business has the necessary support for success.
consultingWithUsMessage: Partnering with us for your software development needs is a wise decision, as we utilize industry best practices and harness the capabilities of full-stack Swift. Our team brings a wealth of experience from diverse fields, enabling us to deliver customized solutions that align with your specific requirements. You might have a vision for your project but are uncertain about how to bring it to life. Alternatively, you may have a particular feature in mind but are unsure of the most effective way to implement it for your situation. Let us help you navigate the right path forward.
consultingDescription1: Assessing client needs and defining project requirements to ensure alignment with business goals.
consultingDescription2: Evaluating the technical aspects of a project to determine its viability and potential challenges.
consultingDescription3: Creating a robust software architecture and design that meets scalability, performance, and security requirements.
consultingDescription4: Advising on the best technologies, frameworks, and tools to use for a specific project.
consultingDescription5: Offering guidance on project planning, scheduling, and resource allocation to ensure timely delivery.
consultingDescription6: Developing tailored software solutions that meet specific client needs, including web, mobile, and desktop applications.
consultingDescription7: Offering insights and design services to enhance user experience and interface design.
consultingDescription8: Advising on best practices for continuous integration, continuous deployment (CI/CD), and infrastructure management.
consultingDescription9: Evaluating software for vulnerabilities and providing recommendations for improving security.
consultingDescription10: Analyzing and optimizing software performance to ensure efficiency and responsiveness.
consultingDescription11: Providing training for teams on new technologies, tools, or processes, as well as ongoing support
consultingDescription12: Offering ongoing maintenance and support services to ensure software remains functional and up-to-date.
productManagementExpertiseDescription: With over ten years of experience in developing MVPs, validating customer feedback, and scaling products, we help you navigate the path to success more efficiently.
productManagementOverview: Product management serves as the cornerstone of effective product development, steering the process from initial concept to market launch. This involves strategic planning, thorough market research, and collaboration across various teams to ensure the product aligns with customer needs and business objectives. Our product management specialists are adept at prioritizing features and managing timelines. We are dedicated to delivering high-quality products that resonate with users and driving growth and innovation while maintaining a clear vision throughout the development journey.
productManagementKeyCompetency6: Creating Proof of Concepts (PoC) and MVPs
projectManagementExpertiseDescription: We share our insights and experience in project management to help your organization reduce development timelines and costs, fostering an environment conducive to innovation.
projectManagementOverview: Successful project management is essential for delivering projects on time and within budget. Our approach emphasizes meticulous planning, effective communication, and proactive risk management. We focus on defining project objectives, establishing realistic timelines, and ensuring that all team members are engaged and aligned. By employing industry-leading tools and methodologies, we track progress, adapt to changes, and maintain high standards throughout the project lifecycle. Our goal is to deliver outcomes that exceed expectations while promoting collaboration and efficiency.
trainingProgramsDescription: We offer a variety of training courses designed to empower your teams and enhance their skills.
trainingOverview: Training is crucial for equipping teams with the knowledge and tools they need to thrive. Our extensive range of training courses is tailored to boost skills, increase productivity, and foster a culture of continuous learning. We customize our training sessions to meet specific needs, whether it’s onboarding new employees, upskilling current staff, or introducing new technologies. Through a blend of interactive workshops, online learning, and real-world applications, we ensure your team is well-prepared to excel in their roles, contributing to the overall success of your organization.
applicationTitle: Take a look at what we do
featuredAppDescription: Your Self Monitored Data End-End-Encrypted Messaging Application
featuredAppMessage: Are you worried about security in today's digital landscape? Do you want a secure communication channel but feel uncertain about who has access to your data? Even with end-to-end encryption, concerns about data storage can linger. Nudge is here to provide the solution you need. With Nudge, you have complete control over your data, allowing you to manage it securely or expand your reach globally without the risk of data persistence. Contact us today to learn more about how you can set up your own instance and enjoy peace of mind with secure communication!
featuredAppDescription2: An Educational Platform for your Software Solutions
featuredAppMessage2: Stream, Read, Discuss. Whether you are new to programming or want to read up on some different software solutions we make it easy for you to do so with our native mac app. Stay tuned in for the latest coding edges.
featuredAppDescription3: Island Hoppers: Your Ultimate Tour App for Seamless Adventures!
featuredAppMessage3: Island Hoppers is the all-in-one app designed to enhance your travel experience, whether you're a company organizing unforgettable tours or a customer seeking the perfect getaway. For companies, our app streamlines the entire tour management process. Organize and customize your tours effortlessly, communicate directly with tour guides, and keep your customers informed with real-time updates. With Island Hoppers, you can manage bookings, track customer preferences, and ensure every detail is taken care of, allowing you to focus on delivering exceptional experiences. For customers, Island Hoppers offers a diverse range of tour packages tailored to suit various group types, including families, backpackers, and party enthusiasts. Browse through our curated selection of adventures, choose the perfect package that fits your style, and connect with like-minded travelers. Enjoy seamless communication with your tour guides, access essential information, and receive personalized recommendations to make the most of your journey. With Island Hoppers, embark on unforgettable adventures with ease and confidence, knowing that every aspect of your tour is just a tap away!
spinetailedKitProject: The goal of SpineTailedKit is to provide a pure RTC Protocol written in Swift. Other RTC Libraries out there are bloated with countless lines of C and C++ needed in order to compile a binary that you simply dont need in your dev environment. While theses libraries are stable and good. We want to provide the next generation of Voice and Video Solutions written in a modern safe high performant language, such as Swift.
needletailKitProject: What is NeedleTailKit? NTK is the backbone of the NeedleTail Client and Server Applications. It is a Software Development Kit that will allow us to create for you a beautiful end-to-end encyrption application. It can be used to develop more than just messaging applications, but really anything that requires end-to-end encrytion. Interesting right? Just contact us to learn more.
whiteTippedSocketsProject: WhiteTippedSockets is a native WebSocket library for iOS and macOS. While the core idea of this project is a transport-services based API rather than a BSD based API. We do have some plan and goals in the works for a completely functional scaleable server as well, both running BSD Sockets and Transport-Services Based servers for your convenience.
swiftStompProject: SwiftSTOMP(Simple Text Oriented Messaging) is a transport protocol written as a lower level programming tool use in you transport layer purposed for networking technologies. While Protocols like this usually need to be custom tailored to your needs(as in most transport protocols) our goal is to provide you a swift based STOMP protocol that is flexible and easy to use.
swiftHlsProject: HTTP Live Streaming is an important technology to use when we want to stream media in a efficient way. SwiftHLS is being designed for you to do so. Using the same protocol that powers the web, HLS lets you serve content using restAPIs and CDNs. HLS is designed for reliability and dynamically adapts to network conditions by optimizing playback for the available speed of wired and wireless connections.
iapEntitlementEngineProject: Everyone wants to get paid. When you build a classy grade A app you should get paid, IAP-Entitlement-Engine helps you to do that designed to be deployed using a Vapor server or any other SwiftNIO server, we try to cover all the points that you will encounter during an in app purchase flow.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

introduction.welcomeMessage: Welcome to NeedleTails.com. Your privacy is important to us.
introduction.purpose: This Privacy Policy outlines our practices regarding the collection of information when you visit our Site.

informationWeDoNotCollect.personalInformation: We do not collect any personal information from our users.

informationCollectedByServersAndTechnolo.overview: While we do not collect personal information, please be aware that servers and other technologies may collect certain information automatically.
informationCollectedByServersAndTechnolo.serverLogs: Web servers may log information about your visit, including:
informationCollectedByServersAndTechnolo.cookiesDescription: Cookies may be used to enhance user experience. These may include:
informationCollectedByServersAndTechnolo.cookiesDetails1: Session Cookies: Temporary cookies that expire when you close your browser.
informationCollectedByServersAndTechnolo.cookiesDetails2: Persistent Cookies: Cookies that remain on your device for a set period or until deleted.
informationCollectedByServersAndTechnolo.analyticsDescription: We may use third-party analytics services that collect information about website usage, such as:

legalUse.userResponsibility: It is your responsibility to ensure that your use of the Site is lawful in your jurisdiction.

limitationOfLiability.overview: The author of this website shall not be held liable for any damages or losses arising from your use of the Site.
limitationOfLiability.userAcknowledgment: By using the Site, you acknowledge that you do so at your own risk and that the author is not responsible for any consequences resulting from your use.

privacyPolicy.changesToThisPrivacyPolicy: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
